title: Bar Demo2
description: This tutorial will guide you through the step-by-step process of creating a bar graph using Python's Matplotlib library. The example in this tutorial shows how to use the default units of centimeters and inches, how to set the x and y units using various keywords, and how to set the x-limits using scalars or units.
